[Page Title: Chow Bella Catering - Catering Menu]

Feed Your Team, Impress Your Guests
INQUIRE CHARLESTON, SC about catering INQUIRE Sarasota, FL about catering 
Ditch the tired office lunch. Chow Bella’s corporate catering blends convenience with creativity, offering curated menus that work for teams of all sizes. Whether you're planning a casual lunch-and-learn or a formal executive dinner, we make it easy to feed your crew something they’ll actually be excited about.

With flexible service styles and delivery options, we can scale up or down to meet your needs — all while keeping it fresh, fast, and on budget.

Popular options include:

Hot lunch buffets
Individual boxed meals
Appetizer platters
Happy hour bites
Pasta bars for team-building events

Perfect for:

Office lunches, corporate parties, conferences, and networking mixers.
Corporate Catering

[Page Title: Chow Bella Catering - James Island, Johns Island, Summerville, Daniel Island, Kiawah Island, Island of Palms, Charleston, SC]

× 
Did you know we do catering?

Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from.

Cater your birthday party, holiday party, corporate events, wedding festivities and more!
Catering Inquiries 
Chow Bella means “Hello, beautiful” in Italian. We think great food should feel like that.

Our Story

from food truck to full-service catering
Read more about us Catering 
supplying catering to special events of all types

When it comes to your next event, let us take care of the food with our delicious and expertly crafted catering options featuring a wide range of dishes that are sure to please any palate.
Catering 
Groups & Parties

customize your celebration with our private party packages

Host an event like no other with our private party options, customized to fit your every need. With flexible private party spaces and exceptional cuisine, your guests are sure to have a memorable and enjoyable experience.

Reviews

review by - Facebook

Laura W:

Amazing find-super flavorful, high end quality Italian food you'd expect in an exclusive restaurant. Really, really tasty.

review by - Facebook

Simone R:

I tried the chicken parm panini and it was out of this world fantastic. So flavorful, with crispy chicken, crispy ciabatta and the sauce was incredible!

review by - Facebook

Becca K:

They came out for my rehearsal dinner at Hampton brew pub. They were amazing! Food was excellent and the service was great. Thank you so much.

review by - Facebook

Rita S:

Just tried this truck for the first time tonight. I ordered the gnocchi with the Italian sausage. It was out of this world delicious. Probably the best I've ever had. Absolutely delicious. I will for sure be hunting you down! Try this truck... you don't be disappointed!!

review by - Facebook

Tim N:

I met them today for the first time. great people and incredible food.. the pizza was to die for. I wanted another one right after the one I had. I will definitely get food from them again.
